Sassy Pug

  • Home
  • Sub Page

This is a Demo Static Site compiled using Prepros.

Built using the following:

  • Pug for HTML
  • SASS (SCSS or "Sassy CSS") for CSS

Key Benefits:

  • Pug supports Includes and VAriables for templating: Note how the header, footer, and nav are all coming from seperate, imported pug files.
  • SASS Supports Variables and Partials for clean, modular styling.

Code Examples 
// Sassy CSS Variables
$color-accent: maroon;
$color-text-light: white;

header,
footer {
    background: $color-accent;
    color: $color-text-light;
}

h1 {
    color: $color-accent;
}
// Pug Templates
|--dist/
      |-- index.html
|-- src/
      |-- index.pug
      |-- includes/
            |-- _header.pug
            |-- _footerh.pug
            |-- _nav.pug
